text: mariyu memu israyil santati varini samudram datincina taruvata varu (nadustu) tama vigrahalanu aradhince oka jati vaddaku ceraru. Varannaru: "O musa! Viri aradhya daivala vale maku kuda oka aradhya daivanni niyamincu." (Daniki musa) javabiccadu: "Niscayanga, miru jnanahinulaina jatiki cendinavaru
